knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```


# Plot PE through time

```{r}
pe<-read_csv(here("output_data/results/PE_baseline_calculations.csv"))
```
All PAs
```{r}

ggplot(pe, aes(x = Year, y = CAPAD_PE)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Protection Equality",
       x = "Year")
```


All capad types 
```{r}

ggplot(pe, aes(x = Year, y = CAPAD_PE, colour = "darkblue")) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(aes(y = Strict_PE, colour = "darkred"))+
  geom_line(aes(y = Non_strict_PE, colour = "darkgreen"))+
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Protection Equality",
       x = "Year",
       colour = "Protection type")
  
```





```{r}
ggsave(here("figures/All_PAs_Protection_equality.png"), width =9, height=7)
```

#Plot MPG 
Load in data 
```{r}
mpg<- read_csv(here("output_data/results/MPG_baseline_calculations.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = Year, y = Capad_MPG, col = "orange")) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(aes(y = Strict_MPG, colour = "blue"))+
  geom_line(aes(y = Non_Strict_MPG, colour = "red"))+
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Mean Protection Gap",
       x = "Year")
```
